hero.title: Hit the road, We'll take care of the rest.
hero.description: Designed to make your experience more enjoyable

whyUs.title: Why choose us
whyUs.description: We are a quality car rental company, we have a dedicated team to offer you an exceptional rental experience.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: You can't find what you're looking for? Contact our

items.question: In which city can you deliver the car to me?
items.answer: We are specialized in delivering cars to Marrakech.

items.question: What documents are needed to rent a car?
items.answer: You must be an adult, have a valid identity card and a valid driver's license.

items.question: What types of vehicles do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a range of city cars and family cars.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept payments by bank card, and by cash.

items.question: Are the cars insured?
items.answer: Yes, all cars are insured by our partner insurance.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.description1: Rent your car with complete peace of mind thanks to a simple, stress-free service designed to save you time and make your experience more enjoyable.
whoWeAre.description2: At Double-O Car, we pride ourselves on offering an exceptional rental experience. Our dedicated team is here to listen to all your needs and accompany you throughout your rental. Whether you need a vehicle for a weekend or for a long period, we have the solution adapted to your expectations.

cta.title: What are you waiting for?
cta.description: Book your vehicle online and enjoy our best offers

Whether you need a vehicle for a weekend or for a long period, we have the solution adapted to your expectations.

contact.title: CONTACT FORM
contact.subtitle: Contact us
contact.description: Feel free to contact us for any questions or information requests
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully. Thank you, we will respond quickly.
contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message.

section1.title: 1. Data collection
section1.intro: Double-O Car collects and processes personal data that you provide to us when using our services, including:
items: Name, first name and contact details (email, phone, address)
Payment information (processed securely)
Vehicle reservation information
Navigation data and cookies

section2.title: 2. Use of data
section2.intro: Your personal data is used to:
items: Process your vehicle reservations
Manage your rentals and contracts
Contact you regarding your reservations
Improve our services and your user experience
Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: 3. Data sharing
section3.intro: We never sell your personal data. We may share your information with:
items: Our service providers (hosting, payment, email sending)
Our vehicle rental partners
Competent authorities if required by law

section4.title: 4. Data security
section4.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against any unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right of access to your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure of your data
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing
section5.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.text: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Modifications
section7.text: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page with an update to the last modification date.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Site publisher
section1.intro: The double-o-car.fr website is published by:

section2.title: 2. Publication director
section2.text: The publication director is the legal representative of Double-O Car.

section3.title: 3. Hosting
section3.text: The site is hosted by a web hosting provider. For any information regarding hosting, please contact us.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
section4.text: All content on this site (texts, images, videos, logos, etc.) is the exclusive property of Double-O Car, unless otherwise stated. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication or adaptation of all or part of the site's elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization from Double-O Car.

section5.title: 5. Personal data protection
section5.text: Personal data collected on this site is processed in accordance with our
section5.text2: and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.text: This site uses cookies to improve the user experience. By continuing to browse this site, you accept the use of cookies in accordance with our privacy policy.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of liability
section7.text1: Double-O Car strives to ensure the accuracy and updating of information published on this site. However, Double-O Car cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision or completeness of information made available on this site.
section7.text2: Double-O Car cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damage caused to the user's equipment when accessing the site, resulting either from the use of equipment that does not meet specifications, or from the appearance of a bug or incompatibility.

section8.title: 8. External links
section8.text: The site may contain links to other websites. Double-O Car is not responsible for the content of these external sites and disclaims any responsibility regarding their content or accessibility.

section9.title: 9. Applicable law
section9.text: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.

section10.title: 10. Contact
section10.text: For any questions regarding these legal notices, you can contact us at:

section1.title: Our Story
section1.paragraph1: Double-O Car was born from a passion for automobiles and a desire to make vehicle rental accessible to everyone. Founded in 2020, our company quickly established itself as a reference player in the car rental sector.
section1.paragraph2: We started with a simple vision: to offer an exceptional rental experience, where every customer feels valued and where every vehicle is carefully selected to meet the most demanding needs.
section1.paragraph3: Today, we are proud to offer a diverse fleet of modern vehicles, ranging from economical city cars to luxury sedans, including spacious SUVs. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction remains at the heart of everything we do.

section2.title: Our Mission
section2.paragraph1: At Double-O Car, our mission is to revolutionize the car rental experience by offering personalized, transparent and accessible service. We believe that every journey deserves to start with an exceptional experience.
items: Providing superior quality vehicles, regularly maintained and checked
Offering transparent and competitive rates with no hidden fees
Providing responsive customer service available 7 days a week
Respecting the environment by promoting fuel-efficient vehicles
Simplifying the booking process for a smooth experience

brahim.name: Brahim
brahim.description: Cofounder of Double-O Car, Brahim has been developing this business for 1 year with passion and determination to offer the best rental experience.

mohamed.name: Mohamed
mohamed.description: Cofounder of Double-O Car, Mohamed has been developing this business for 1 year with passion and determination to offer the best rental experience.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from vehicle selection to customer welcome.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: No hidden fees, no surprises. We believe in clear and honest communication with our customers.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We adopt the latest technologies to constantly improve our customers' experience.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We are committed to a greener future by offering fuel-efficient vehicles and promoting sustainable practices.
